text: Madiyan kay pani per jab aap phonchay to dekha kay logon ki aik jamat wahan pani pila rahi hai aur do aurten alag khari apnay (janwaron ko) rokti hui dikhaee den poocha kay tumhara kiya haal hai woh boleen kay jab tak yeh charwahey wapis na lot jayen hum pani nahi pilatin aur humaray walid boht bari umar kay boorhay hain
